name: Last Hours Of Jack
description: Last Hours Of Jack is an adventure game full of gory action and comedy. Take control of Jack, the most sociopath and nerdy IT guy who works for a tech company, who will unexpectedly become the ultimate action hero in order to save the office (and the world?) from a zombie apocalypse!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: i3 or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce / Radeon / equivalent with openGL 2.0 support Storage: 275 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: i7 or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960A / Radeon HD7770 / equivalent or higher Storage: 275 MB available space
